betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§oIndium has uses as a semiconductor.§r

Getting §aIndium§r requires a lot of §dSulfuric Acid§r, and two different ores: Galena and Sphalerite.

§dSulfuric Acid§r can be produced in large scale in the §3Large Chemical Reactor§r, or obtained as a waste from the §9Platinum Group Sludge§r process.

In §dLuV§r, the mandatory §9Naquadah chain§r will grant §aIndium§r too, which means this setup will have a limited life.

Use the §5§d§k§1§3§5§9Circuit 4§r recipe to avoid having to deal with Small Dusts.

§bLore:§r Another small chain inherited from GregTech 5. However this used to yield one tiny Dust instead, which was very painful.
